PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2020-01752020-03-24,  ,  HC,  PHAC,  , 
ActQuarantine Act
SubjectMinimizing the Risk of Exposure to COVID-19 in Canada Order (Mandatory Isolation)
PrecisMINIMIZING THE RISK OF EXPOSURE TO COVID-19 IN CANADA ORDER (MANDATORY ISOLATION) in order to manage all persons who enter Canada whether by air, land rail and sea, to minimize the travel related risk of introduction and spread of COVID-19 coronavirus disease by requiring all persons who enter Canada to isolate for 14 days from the day upon which they entered Canada.
AttachmentsAttachment
